languages.text: Десятки пиратских судов слетаются в систему и устраивают охоту на друкари. Ксеносы поспешно ретируются, уводя пиратов за собой.
Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.
languages.original_text: Десятки пиратских судов слетаются в систему и устраивают охоту на друкари. Ксеносы поспешно ретируются, уводя пиратов за собой.

traits.locale_text: Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.
The patrols are incapable of catching the Drukhari, but their presence is enough to scare the raiders away.
Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.
The patrols are incapable of catching the Drukhari, but their presence is enough to scare the raiders away.
Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.
Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.
Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.
Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.
Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.

languages.text: Des dizaines de vaisseaux pirates débarquent dans le système pour traquer les Drukharis qui battent en retraite à la hâte, leurs poursuivants aux trousses.
languages.original_text: Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.

traits.locale_text: Des dizaines de vaisseaux pirates débarquent dans le système pour traquer les Drukharis qui battent en retraite à la hâte, leurs poursuivants aux trousses.

languages.text: 数十隻の海賊船がデュカーリを狩るために星系に到着した。異種族たちは慌てて退却し、海賊たちも後を追っていった。
languages.original_text: Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.

traits.locale_text: 数十隻の海賊船がデュカーリを狩るために星系に到着した。異種族たちは慌てて退却し、海賊たちも後を追っていった。

languages.text: 几十艘海盗船来到这个星系，四处狩猎黑暗灵族。异形匆忙撤退，海盗紧追不舍。
languages.original_text: Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.

traits.locale_text: 几十艘海盗船来到这个星系，四处狩猎黑暗灵族。异形匆忙撤退，海盗紧追不舍。

languages.text: Una veintena de naves piratas llega al sistema a la caza de los Drukhari. Los xenos se retiran apresuradamente, y los piratas los siguen.
languages.original_text: Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.

traits.locale_text: Una veintena de naves piratas llega al sistema a la caza de los Drukhari. Los xenos se retiran apresuradamente, y los piratas los siguen.

languages.text: Dutzende von Piratneschiffen treffen im System ein, um Jagd auf die Drukhari zu machen. Die Xenos ziehen sich überstürzt zurück, die Piraten tun es ihnen gleich.
languages.original_text: Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.

traits.locale_text: Dutzende von Piratneschiffen treffen im System ein, um Jagd auf die Drukhari zu machen. Die Xenos ziehen sich überstürzt zurück, die Piraten tun es ihnen gleich.

languages.text: Drukharileri avlamak için sisteme onlarca korsan gemisi varıyor. Zenolar alelacele kaçarken korsanlar da peşlerine düşüyor.
languages.original_text: Dozens of pirate ships arrive in the system to hunt the Drukhari. The xenos beat a hasty retreat, and the pirates follow.
